notFound.descriptionL1: Unfortunately the page that you requested does not exist. At least not in this universe.
notFound.descriptionL2: You can either try to look for that page in a parallel universe or

created.singular: The item has been successfully created!

updated.singular: The item has been successfully updated!

deleted.singular: The item has been successfully deleted!

error.unknown: The request was not successful because the server returned: {{reason}}

resourceNotFound.singular: The resource could not be found on the server!
resourceNotFound.plural: {{$count}} resources could not be found on the server!

serverCouldNotBeReached.singular: The server could not be reached. Check if you have an active connection to the internet.

offline.title: No Internet Connection
offline.body: It looks like that you lost the connection to the internet. Make sure to have an active connection.

newPortalVersion.title: A new Version is available!
newPortalVersion.body: Good news, a new version of the MW-UI Portal is available!
newPortalVersion.action: Restart the applikcation to get the latest version.
